official_title: A bill to transfer certain public lands in Nevada to the Toiyabe, Humboldt, and Inyo National Forests.
short_title: National Forests and Public Lands of Nevada Enhancement Act of 1986

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) National Forests and Public Lands of Nevada Enhancement Act of 1986 - Transfers specified public lands in Nevada to the Secretary of Agriculture for inclusion in the Toiyabe or Inyo National Forests. Transfers specified national forest lands to the Secretary of the Interior. Requires lands designated for inclusion in such Forests to be managed so as not to impair their suitability for wilderness designation. Excludes such additional national forest lands from calculations for interstate (California and Nevada) but not intrastate (Nevada) distribution of the Twenty-Five Percent Fund.

titles.title: National Forests of Nevada Enhancement Act of 1986

A bill to transfer certain public lands in Nevada to the Toiyabe, Humboldt, and Inyo National Forests.
